short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Applies an aging effect to Wikipedia pages depending on time since their last edit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you know that the average article on the English Wikipedia hasn't been edited in 150 days? Wikiage gives an easily-assessable visual presence to the "staleness" of pages on Wikipedia and other Wikimedia Foundation sites (Wiktionary, Wikiquote, Wikibooks, etc.) by applying a highly realistic aging effect to the full body of each page based on the time since its last change.

Wikiage is open-source: https://github.com/okofish/wikiage
Wikipedia, Wiktionary, Wikiquote, and Wikibooks are trademarks of the Wikimedia Foundation. Wikiage is not endorsed by or affiliated with the Wikimedia Foundation.
